description:
My place is close to Soho, Fidi, Tribeca, great shopping, amazing restaurants.  Chinatown and Little Italy blocks away. Across the street from the Brooklyn Bridge which is great for a nice stroll!  Visit the Freedom Tower only a 5 minute away.  . You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the comfy bed, the coziness..LOCATION!. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. More pictures coming soon!

My apartment is a very spacious alcove studio apartment. There is a very cozy queen size bed as well as a full size pull out couch.

Access is simple. I will leave keys with front desk or meet you at the apartment.

I will always be available and in close proximity.

4,5,6 train is literally across the street.  The 1,2,3 and A,C,E are a few short blocks away. 
The Brooklyn bridge with famous Grimaldi's pizza at the end is located a few short blocks way as well.  Soho shopping and Tribeca dining all in walking distance.
name: Spacious Tribeca loft! Roofdeck & close to trains
